nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Droid Tales Episodes I-III

LEGO Star Wars: Droid Tales Episodes I-III is a LEGO Star Wars title recapping the first three installments of the television series LEGO Star Wars: Droid Tales, "Exit from Endor," "Crisis on Coruscant" and "Mission to Mos Eisley."

The legendary conflict between the Jedi and the Sith is retold through the eyes of C-3P-0 [sic] and R2-D2! When Obi-Wan and Qui-Gon Jinn meet young Anakin Skywalker, little do they know that their actions will determine the fate of the entire galaxy. Action-packed and full of laughs, this collection is perfect for any LEGO® Star WarsTM fan!
